analysis.description:
AerumCrowdsale.completionPercentage (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#910-914) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balance == 0

AerumCrowdsale.completionPercentage (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#910-914) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balance == 0
AerumCrowdsale.pledgeCompletionPercentage (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1030-1035) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balance == 0

Reentrancy in AerumCrowdsale.airDropTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1059-1069):
	External calls:
	- _ensureTokensListAvailable(_tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1064)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1065-1066)

Reentrancy in AerumCrowdsale.pledge (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1038-1056):
	External calls:
	- _ensureTokensListAvailable(_tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1046)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledgeTotal (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1048-1049)

AerumCrowdsale.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#881-893) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#893)

Reentrancy in AerumCrowdsale.airDropTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1059-1069):
	External calls:
	- _ensureTokensListAvailable(_tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1064)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1066-1068)

Reentrancy in AerumCrowdsale.pledge (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1038-1056):
	External calls:
	- _ensureTokensListAvailable(_tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1046)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pledges (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1050-1053)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#211-222) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#218-219)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#227-232) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#231-232)

AerumCrowdsale.setPledgeClosingTime (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#838-843) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_pledgeClosingTime >= openingTime && _pledgeClosingTime <= closingTime) (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#839-841)

AerumCrowdsale.pledgeOpen (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1015-1017) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (openingTime <= block.timestamp) && (block.timestamp <= pledgeClosingTime) (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#1015-1017)
KYCRefundableCrowdsale.percentage should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x248d27095a659fc125a16b6191fb6b904936f475.sol#647-649)
